Comments_List: Survey of commonly used empirical methods in management research; learned how to conduct different analyses and also learned about the sorts of problems to look out for when doing these analyses.
Introduced to various estimation choices and practical issues that arise in analyzing data

Very helpful course overall and it got me exposed to the applied nature of the stats we learn in other courses. Some of the material was a bit difficult to understand so a brief lecture on the basics might be good in orienting students quicker to the material.

- covered practical issues that are not covered by other quant method classes
- learning by dyoing nature of the class
Yes! Very helpful for getting experience in applied research through assignments and the professor is very helpful in answering questions.
